bill_title: Honoring Devon O'Farrell from Washington High School for a state wrestling championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Devon O'Farrell from Washington High School for a state wrestling championship. WHEREAS, Devon O'Farrell had an outstanding wrestling season in 2012 with a final record of forty-five wins and one loss; and WHEREAS, in 2012 Devon O'Farrell was an individual state wrestling champion in the two hundred twenty pound weight class at the Boys State Class A wrestling championships, winning his title match by a score of six to four; and WHEREAS, Devon O'Farrell demonstrated outstanding athletic ability, determination, and the willingness to make sacrifices: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors Devon O'Farrell for his state wrestling championship.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Devon O'Farrell from Washington High School for a state wrestling championship. WHEREAS, Devon O'Farrell had an outstanding wrestling season in 2012 with a final record of forty-five wins and one loss; and WHEREAS, in 2012 Devon O'Farrell was an individual state wrestling champion in the two hundred twenty pound weight class at the Boys State Class A wrestling championships, winning his title match by a score of six to four; and WHEREAS, Devon O'Farrell demonstrated outstanding athletic ability, determination, and the willingness to make sacrifices: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors Devon O'Farrell for his state wrestling championship. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
